task.title: How do I prove I am a Resident of Fulton County?
task.shortdesc: The item you will need to provide as proof of residence varies depending on age, and how you qualify for residency.

step.cmd: Use the decision tree to select the appropriate item to bring in for proof of residency
After completing the online application, present this item and your completed application to the clerk at the circulation desk of any Fulton County Library branch.
